Aquatic Adaptation.name: 水生适应 Aquatic Adaptation
Aquatic Adaptation.description: 你的爬行类生理结构让你能够长时间屏住呼吸。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aJUXbe9HJVvv0Mxa]{龟息 Breath Control} 通用专长作为奖励专长。

Automaton Core.name: 灵导械核心 Automaton Core
Automaton Core.description: 你的躯体包含了一个灌注有位面精华的灵导械核心，其确保了你从事各种任务并保有你的灵魂和生命力。这种生命能量像类人生物的血液般流经你的躯体。它让你成为一个活着的生物。你没有一般构装体的免疫能力，会被以活着生物为目标的效果所影响，并且可以如常通过正能量恢复生命。额外的，当生命值降为0时你不会被摧毁。取而代之的是，你的生命力会尝试在险境中维持你的运作；当生命值将为0时，你被击倒并濒死（dying）。

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Your sharp teeth and powerful jaws are fearsome weapons. You have a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your jaws are in the brawling group.

Blunt Snout.name: 钝鼻 Blunt Snout
Blunt Snout.description: 你小而短粗的钝鼻和迷宫般的鼻窦系统让你可以抵抗针对鼻子的攻击。在面对吸入性威胁（例如吸入的毒药）和嗅觉效果（例如战蜥人恶臭）时，你的豁免检定结果视为比掷骰结果提升一个等级。（译注：大失败变为失败，失败变为成功，成功变为大成功）

Change Shape.name: 化形 Change Shape
Change Shape.description: 身为狐妖，你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.wwvPiG2kET2rkSAG]{化形（狐妖） Change Shape (Kitsune)} 能力。

Change Shape (Anadi).name: 化形（半蛛人） Change Shape (Anadi)
Change Shape (Anadi).description: 作为半蛛人，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{化形（半蛛人） Change Shape (Anadi)} 能力。

Clan Dagger.name: 氏族匕首 Clan Dagger
Clan Dagger.description: 你免费获得一柄所属氏族的@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kJJvKm80KwWXPukV]{氏族匕首 clan dagger}，它在你出生时就被交予你。出售这柄匕首是非常严重的禁忌，只会让你被其他矮人蔑视。

Claws.name: Claws
Claws.description: Your sharp claws offer an alternative to the fists other humanoids bring to a fight. You have a claw unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d4}[slashing]]]{1d4 slashing damage} and has the agile and finesse traits.

Constructed.name: Constructed
Constructed.description: Your synthetic body resists ailments better than those of purely biological organisms. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases, poisons, and radiation.

Constructed (Poppet).name: Constructed (Poppet)
Constructed (Poppet).description: The materials of your body resist ailments that assail the flesh. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against death effects, disease, and poison as well as to saving throws against effects that would give you the drained, paralyzed, or sickened conditions. Your spark of life means that you're a living creature, and you can be healed by positive energy and harmed by negative energy as normal.

Constructed Body.name: Constructed Body
Constructed Body.description: Your physiological needs are different than those of living creatures. You don't need to eat or drink. You don't need to sleep, but you still need a daily period of rest. During this period of rest, you must enter a recuperating standby state for 2 hours, which is similar to sleeping except you are aware of your surroundings and don't take penalties for being @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. Much like with sleeping, if you go too long without entering your standby state, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and can't recover until you enter standby for 2 hours.

Darkvision.name: 黑暗视觉 Darkvision
Darkvision.description: 拥有黑暗视觉的生物可以完美在黑暗和昏暗光中视物，只是这个视角下只能看到黑白二色。

Draconic Exemplar.name: 龙血典范 Draconic Exemplar
Draconic Exemplar.description:
你能够从龙血典范中汲取些许力量。从彩色或金属龙中选择一种作为你的龙血典范。这决定了你的鳞色以及外观，根据GM的判断，龙类有时候会对更加青睐那些与自身相近的狗头人。你的龙血典范还会确定一些其他角色细节，详细请使用龙血典范表。

表1-1 龙血典范

龙种 喷吐武器形状 伤害类型 豁免检定
黑龙 线性 强酸 反射
蓝龙 线性 电击 反射
绿龙 锥形 毒素 强韧
红龙 锥形 火焰 反射
白龙 锥形 寒冷 反射
黄铜龙 线性 火焰 反射
青铜龙 线性 电击 反射
赤铜龙 线性 强酸 反射
金龙 锥形 火焰 反射
银龙 锥形 寒冷 反射

Emotionally Unaware.name: Emotionally Unaware
Emotionally Unaware.description: You find it difficult to understand and express complex emotions. You take a -1 circumstance penalty to Diplomacy and Performance checks, and on Perception checks to Sense Motive.

Eyes in Back.name: Eyes in Back
Eyes in Back.description: You have eyes that point in several different directions and instinctively notice movement in the peripheries of your vision. When you use the Seek basic action, you can look for creatures in two areas instead of one. If precision is necessary, you can select two 30-foot cones or 15-foot bursts within line of sight instead of one.

Fangs.name: Fangs
Fangs.description: You were born with a natural means for hunting and self-defense. You gain a fangs unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your fangs are in the brawling group and have the finesse and unarmed traits.

Flammable.name: Flammable
Flammable.description: You have weakness to fire damage equal to one-third your level (minimum 1).

Greater Darkvision.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision
Greater Darkvision.description: 拥有高等黑暗视觉的生物可以完美在黑暗和昏暗光中视物，只是这个视角下只能看到黑白二色。某些形式的魔法黑暗，例如4环@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{黑暗术 Darkness}，能阻挡普通的 @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.HHVQDp61ehcpdiU8]{黑暗视觉 Darkvision}，高等黑暗视觉才能看穿这些形式的魔法黑暗。

Hydration.name: Hydration
Hydration.description:
While you are an amphibious being equally as capable on land as in the water, your body requires you to return to aquatic environments at least once in a 24-hour period. You must submerge in water in order to rehydrate your water-acclimated skin.

If you fail to do this, your skin begins to crack and your gills become painful. After the first 24 hours outside of water, you take a –1 status penalty to Fortitude saves. After 48 hours, you struggle to breathe air and begin to suffocate until returned to water.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.Q5FUu7yhWPJlcXei]{Effect: Hydration}

Keen Eyes.name: Keen Eyes
Keen Eyes.description: Your eyes are sharp, allowing you to make out small details about concealed or even invisible creatures that others might miss. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures within 30 feet of you. When you target an opponent that is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you or hidden from you, reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or 9 for a hidden one.

Land on Your Feet.name: Land on Your Feet
Land on Your Feet.description: When you fall, you take only half the normal damage and don't land @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Low-Light Vision.name: 低光视觉 Low-Light Vision
Low-Light Vision.description: 有低光视觉的生物在昏暗光中视物如同在明亮光中一样，因此其忽略昏暗光提供的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Magical Strikes.name: Magical Strikes
Magical Strikes.description: Your inherent magic pervades your entire being. All your Strikes are magical, whether with unarmed attacks or weapons.

Plant Nourishment.name: Plant Nourishment
Plant Nourishment.description: You gain nourishment in the same way that the plants or fungi that match your body type normally do, through some combination of photosynthesis, absorbing minerals with your roots, or scavenging decaying matter. You typically do not need to pay for food. If you normally rely on photosynthesis and go without sunlight for 1 week, you begin to starve. You can derive nourishment from specially formulated bottles of sunlight instead of natural sunlight, but these bottles cost 10 times as much as standard rations (or 40 sp).

Sharp Beak.name: Sharp Beak
Sharp Beak.description: With your Sharp Beak, you are never without a weapon. You have a beak unarmed attack that deals [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage}. Your beak is in the brawling weapon group and has the finesse and unarmed traits.

Stonestep Shisk.name: Stonestep Shisk
Stonestep Shisk.description: Navigating mountains and other rocky terrain is second nature to you. You can ignore non-magical difficult terrain caused by rubble and uneven ground made of stone and earth.

Sunlight Healing.name: Sunlight Healing
Sunlight Healing.description: A conrasu can enter a meditative, healing state as a 10-minute activity when exposed to direct sunlight, in which case they recover 1d8 Hit Points. At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this healing increases by 1d8. Once a conrasu has recovered Hit Points in this way, they are temporarily immune to further uses of Sunlight Healing for 1 day.

Swim.name: Swim
Swim.description: Azarketi get a base Swim speed of 30.

Unusual Anatomy.name: Unusual Anatomy
Unusual Anatomy.description: Your unorthodox body resists physical afflictions meant for other creatures. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against diseases and poisons.

Wings.name: Wings
Wings.description:
All strix possess powerful wings. While not all strix focus on honing their flying skills, a strong flap of their wings allows strix to travel longer distances when jumping.

When Leaping horizontally, you move an additional 5 feet. You don't automatically fail your checks to High Jump or Long Jump if you don't Stride at least 10 feet first. In addition, when you make a Long Jump, you can jump a distance up to 10 feet further than your Athletics check result, though still with the normal maximum of your Speed.
